me.alb_i986.selenium.tinafw.tests.rules

Class BrowserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • me.alb_i986.selenium.tinafw.tests.rules.BrowserManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class BrowserManager
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
    JUnit Rule responsible for closing all registered browsers as soon as a test finishes.

    It is recommended NOT to have tests explicitly close their browsers, otherwise some other rules may be prevented from doing their job, e.g. HtmlReporter.
